welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chaguanas, the bustling heart of Trinidad and Tobago! Get ready to experience the vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and lively markets that this charming city is known for. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and immersing yourself in all that Chaguanas has to offer.
